data.prayer: Father, encourage the 2,361 believers in Dayr Az Zawr to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Dayr Az Zawr, Syria
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Dayr Az Zawr, Syria from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.section_summary: On average, 77 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Dayr Az Zawr, Syria.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Father, you desire the people in the state of Dayr Az Zawr who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Dayr Az Zawr, Syria.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.prayer: Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Romani, Domari people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Dayr Az Zawr.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the children in the state of Dayr Az Zawr to pray with passion and pleading for your presence.
Spirit, train the church of Dayr Az Zawr, Syria to trust with all their hearts, and you will make their paths straight.
data.verse: Trust in Yahweh with all your heart, and don’t lean on your own understanding. In all your ways acknowledge him, and he will make your paths straight.
